metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15672 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low
metadata.Description:
The read_header function in libavcodec/ffv1dec.c in FFmpeg 2.4 and 3.3.4and possibly earlier allows remote attackers to have unspecified impact viaa crafted MP4 file, which triggers an out-of-bounds read.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15672` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ffmpeg - 7:3.4-1
libavcodec-extra - 7:3.4-1
libavcodec-extra59 - 7:3.4-1
libavcodec59 - 7:3.4-1
libavdevice59 - 7:3.4-1
libavfilter-extra - 7:3.4-1
libavfilter-extra8 - 7:3.4-1
libavfilter8 - 7:3.4-1
libavformat-extra - 7:3.4-1
libavformat-extra59 - 7:3.4-1
libavformat59 - 7:3.4-1
libavutil57 - 7:3.4-1
libpostproc56 - 7:3.4-1
libswresample4 - 7:3.4-1
libswscale6 - 7:3.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7:3.4-1').
